txt.en: A recipe for a mushroom stew made with beef and bacon.

Ingredients:

1 Package beef from the meat stall
1 Handful salt from the cooking area
1 Bowlful of water (try the well).
1 Bunch fresh carrots from near the vegetable display
1 Large slab bacon from the shelf in the meat stall
2 Large bunches of mushrooms from the mushroom tent (up on the hill near the Three Farthing Stone)
